reviews.text: The music was great, the sets were great, and dancing robots... superb! 5++
I can't believe how bad the plot is. The Great Kotlin was way better. The director needs to be fired.

Trzyma na krawędzi. Koszmar każdego programisty spełnia się na ekranie. Podpisywanie certyfikatów, błędy oprogramowania, uczucie beznadziei. Szczerze polecam ten film, bawiłem się bardzo dobrze ponieważ pokazywał dokładnie przez co przechodzę każdego dnia.
Il film era molto carino e divertente. La grafica al computer dell'epoca fa un po' sorridere ai giorni nostri, ma tutto sommato e' pur sempre ben fatto.

Nella lotta del bene contro il male, fa impallidire come il cattivo riesca a sfoderare e usare l'Xcode senza intoppi - anche se a tratti sembrava più a suo agio con l'AppCode, nonostante la sua pesantezza e conseguente minor maneggevolezza. Comunque, nella sua nona reincarnazione, l'Xcode, pur sempre in versione prototipo, risulta essere un'arma letale, se impugnata da mani esperte.

L'ennesimo sugli zombi, questa volta chiamati Deadlock, in quanto sono dei morti a cui piace chiudersi a chiave nei posti più disparati, a cominciare dai bagni, per proseguire con i vari sgabuzzini, ripostigli e armadi. Tutto molto imbarazzante e grottesco.
Jaw-dropping! I literally lost control of my jaw!
The models were pretty great, but I thought they could have used a little more dragons. Also I didn't learn anything. It's for machines only!!

O.M.G! O.MG! O.M.G! This movie has everything—crashes, bugs, zombies, they're all in there! Xcode Apocalypse is the story of Xcode, a young IDE who has aspirations of becoming the most famous and most popular of all the IDEs, but who is plagued by the deadly "SourceKit Service Crashed" disease. The movie follows Xcode on his journey to find a cure, and along the way sees him involved in many crashes, fighting many killer bugs and zombies, and eventually confront  0x8badf00d, the leader of the fabled Watchdogs. BEST.MOVIE.EVER!
Pese a que no me gustan los musicales, The Sound of MusicKit me ha dejado impactado. Fácilmente es una de mis películas favoritas. La recomiendo!

Muy mala película. Aburrida, solo habla de deadlocks, deadlocks, y más deadlocks. Es mi peor pesadilla hecha película. Tengo suficiente con problemas en mi código todos los días, no necesito una película para recordarme, y torturarme con esto.
Increíble. Justo cuando pensamos que Apple ya no tiene cómo innovar, sacan una película sobre el maravilloso iPhone con sexto sentido.
Este es un excelente documental acerca de Xcode. Es fiel a la realidad, y debo decir que me empatizo mucho con las personas que, al igual que yo, usan Xcode todos los días. Muy buena película!
For all my time spent in Austria, I never really got into this. Even the oompah band in the background was loud and annoying. Minus four stars.
Ye-hah! Hold on to your hats boys, but this bug is coming straight for ya! Tiberius Antman is the rootin-tootinist leadman in a generation.
More like Night of the boring deadlocks. Die Ning Philosopher was a big joke. I've seen more contentious I/O at my local burger joint.
What a great film! Ms. Keras Smith was truly magnificent, and Billy Caffe's singing and dancing is the stuff of legends. Three thumbs up!
Thrill ride from stop to finish! No better way than bing the best. Johnny Rocketship punched through a nib!
Westerns are awful. I want my money back. Ellie Optional was horrible; a total nil!
iPhones are awful. Androids rule! Jim Forcetouch is a loser. Why does he keep making movies?
Best four hours of my life. The show was great, and so was Chris Mainqueue. What a heartthrob!
I loved it! Great singing and dancing. And who could forget that classic duet between Dr. M. and Faire Playe. Go and see it now.
Boo! This thing was awful. Learn to sing for realz Faire Playe!
